document_data.caption: The area between [[Archenbridge]] and [[White Ford]] where the road is located.
document_data.name: West Road
document_data.mainbody: The '''West Road''' was a trade route along the [[River Arkhen]] that stretched from [[Archenbridge]] in the south to [[White Ford]] in the north of [[Archendale]].
document_data.Geography: The road was located to the east of River Arkhen and to the west of [[Arch Wood]], providing a safer passage for traders traveling through the Dale.
document_data.Travel:
The road stretched for about {{SI|45|mile|k|long=yes}} between Archenbridge and White Ford.

The West Road was overlooked by the old fortress called [[Swordpoint]] towering above the southern end of the road and the [[Arkhen Ford]].
